00042 #include "batterychargercontrol.h"
00043 #include "acqinfoblock.h"
00044 #include "acqunit.h"
00045 #include <QDebug>
00046 #include <QApplication>
00047 #include <QMessageBox>
00048 #include <QString>
00049 
00050 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 int main(int argc,char ** argv)
00061 {
00062     bool finished = false;
00063     bool execOK;
00064     while (! finished)
00065     {
00066         finished = true;
00067         execOK = true;
00068         QApplication application(argc,argv);
00070         AcqUnit* unit = new AcqUnit();
00072         if (! unit->isSynchronized())
00073         {
00074             QMessageBox::critical(0,"Synchronization Problem",
00075                         QString("%1").arg(unit->error())+
00076                         "\n Check device power and serial port");
00077             execOK = false;
00078         }
00082         else if (! unit->isConfigured())
00083         {
00084             execOK = false;
00085             AcqInfoBlockDialogue infoBlockDialogue(unit);
00086             if(infoBlockDialogue.exec())
00089             {
00090                 if (! unit->configure())
00091                 {
00092                     QMessageBox::critical(0,"Configuration Problem\n",
00093                                 QString("%1").arg(unit->error())+
00094                                "\n Device did not store Configuration\n"
00095                                "Did you Program it?");
00096                 }
00097                 else finished = false;            // Go back and redo windows
00098             }
00099         }
00100         if (execOK)
00101         {
00103             BatteryChargerControl controlDialogue(unit);
00104             controlDialogue.show();
00105             execOK = application.exec();
00106         }
00107         delete unit;
00108     }
00109     return execOK;
00110 }
00111 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
